channel.title: Replace text with contact info
channel.description:
Maybe somebody can help me. I'd love to have an action that can replace text with a contact's first name.
I often send inspirational thoughts to friends and coworkers, and I'd love to write a single message that could be personalized and sent to individuals.

item.title: Replace text with contact info
item.dc:creator: sylumer
item.description:
yazanabbas11:

What are these characters and many more for?

Look up the term “Regular Expression”.
